articles.title: Maison Yusif unveils 2 new fragrances, opens flagship store in Accra
articles.summary: Maison Yusif, a Ghanaian luxury perfume brand, launched two new signature scents, 'The Fountain of Youth' and 'Exclyusif', at the opening of its new flagship store in Accra. The fragrances mark the brand's next chapter in Ghana's emerging luxury fragrance market and were created with passion and care.

articles.title: Lightning-Fast Deal!
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The Poco X7 Pro smartphone is available with a 43% discount. The phone features a high-performance processor, a vibrant high-resolution display, an advanced camera system, and a long-lasting battery. The offer is a limited-time deal available at [Retailer Name/Website].

articles.title: 37 Reviewer-Beloved "Glow Up" Beauty Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have recently launched new beauty and skincare products. Examples include Lumify Eye Drops, known for redness reduction; Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, formulated to hydrate and tighten skin; and Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, designed to absorb oil and blur pores. Other notable releases are from brands like La Roche-Posay, Clinique, Moroccanoil, and Black Girl Sunscreen, with products ranging from tinted sunscreens to lip glosses and hair care items.

articles.title: Forum for village products
articles.summary: Hitad.lk offers a service by providing a selection of used and new cars for sale. The Ceylon Chamber of Commerce and GIZ showcased sustainable products made by rural women entrepreneurs from Hambantota.

articles.title: I tried a robot vacuum with a mechanical arm
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Roborock is releasing the Saros Z70, a $4000 robot vacuum with a mechanical arm intended to pick up and relocate small objects. Initial tests show the robot can only pick up specific items like socks, cloths, tissues, and sandals under certain conditions, and may not perform as expected in all scenarios.

articles.title: â€˜Dirty ashtray wrapped in floral notes': The unusual perfumes worth trying
articles.author: Stephanie Darling
articles.summary: Editions de Parfums By FrÃ©dÃ©ric Malle offers Portrait of a Lady, while Tom Ford has introduced Vanilla Sex ($395 for 30ml). Libre d'Orange features SÃ©crÃ©tions Magnifiques ($150 for 50ml), and Moth and Rabbit Perfumes presents La Haine ($165 for 50ml).

articles.title: I tried a robot vacuum with a mechanical arm
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Roborock is launching the Saros Z70, a robot vacuum featuring a mechanical arm for picking up and relocating small objects like socks and sandals. This new product aims to provide a more comprehensive cleaning solution by addressing the issue of small items obstructing the vacuum's path.

articles.title: 25 Chewy Items To Make Sure Your Home Doesn't Stink
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: The article introduces various new pet care products and services designed to combat odors and maintain cleanliness. These include stain and odor removers, self-cleaning litter boxes, food storage containers, hand vacuums, pet grooming vacuums, dental powders, wash stations, kitty litter, deodorizing sprays, lint rollers, grooming wipes, paw cleaners, laundry boosters, air purifiers, bamboo charcoal bags, carpet refreshers, odor eliminators, gland wipes, litter-trapping mats, multi-surface cleaners, fabric and air sprays, carpet cleaners, waterless cat shampoo, air conditioner filters, and waterproof blankets, each designed to address specific pet-related messes and odors.

articles.title: Kao Adopts Social Media Tactics From Startup To Revive Sales
articles.summary: Kao launched a new hair care brand called Melt in Spring 2024, which has reached 2.5 million units in cumulative shipments.  Following this success, Kao released The Answer in Autumn 2024, which surpassed one million units in shipments within seven months. These launches are part of Kao's strategy to focus on high-end hair care products.

articles.title: Aldi worker says â‚¬3 product is 'best in the entire supermarket' in viral video
articles.author: Alice Sjoberg
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced two new gelato flavors: Tiramisu and Lemon Meringue. A TikTok user who works at Aldi has highlighted the tiramisu gelato as the best product he has ever tried from Aldi. The gelato is priced at around â‚¬3 per tub.

articles.title: New Look shoppers praise 'stylish' Â£30 trousers that go with any top
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Striped Drawstring Waist Wide Leg Trousers for Â£29.99 and the Rib Button Through Tank Top for Â£12.99. Stradivarius sells the Flowing Striped Linen Blend Trousers for Â£22.99, while ASOS offers the Linen Blend Wide Leg Trouser for Â£28. These trousers feature wide-leg designs with elasticated waists and are available in various colors and sizes.

articles.title: d'you launched their Minis and made it Massive
articles.author: Rekha Nair
articles.summary: d'you, a skincare brand, launched mini versions of their hero products. They initiated a 360Â° marketing campaign involving social media teasers, puzzles, and collaborations with influencers like Diet Sabya, building anticipation for the launch. d'you celebrated the launch with a "Mini Plunge" party and distributed mailers to creators, resulting in wide engagement.

articles.title: Next shoppers say Â£12 'lightweight' T-shirt dress is 'ideal for summer days'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Next is selling the '100% Cotton T-Shirt Dress' for Â£12, available in seven shades. New Look offers the 'Light Blue Broderie Anglaise V-Neck Midi Shirt Dress' for Â£34.99 as a summer attire.

articles.title: Next's 'minimal creasing' Â£34 linen maxi dress 'looks lovely on'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is offering the Red Halterneck Maxi Dress With Linen, priced at Â£34, in sizes ranging from six to 26 and multiple colors. The linen-blend dress features a halterneck, pockets, and a maxi length, and it is designed for summer wear.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' Â£34 linen maxi dress is 'perfect for summer'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next has launched the 'Red Halterneck Maxi Dress With Linen', available in various sizes and colors. The dress features a halterneck design, pockets, and a linen blend material. Customer reviews highlight its suitability for summer, although some sizing issues have been reported.

articles.title: Everything you need to know about Trump-Mobile, the president's operator
articles.author: Diego PÃ©rez Morales
org: United States Patent and Trademark Office
articles.summary: Former President Donald Trump is preparing to launch a new mobile service, 'Trump Mobile,' through DTTM Operations LLC. The company has filed trademarks for 'Trump Mobile' and 'T1' for mobile, wireless services, and technological products, with plans to establish physical stores. This launch signals the introduction of a new competitor into the telecommunications market.

articles.title: Amazon Restocks the Dyson V11 and Drops Its Price to a Stunning New All-Time Low
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Dyson V11 Origin cordless stick vacuum is now available at a price cut on Amazon. This model offers features like a 25.2-volt motor, three power modes (Auto, Eco, and Boost), and HEPA filtration.

articles.title: Trump again cashing in on a 'side-hustle playing off MAGA patriotism': report
articles.author: Tom Boggioni
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched Trump Mobile, a service offering a gold phone for a monthly fee of $47.45. This venture is seen by some as a way for Donald Trump to capitalize on his political popularity and brand.

articles.title: Man charged with cousin's murder on San Antonio's west side, SAPD says
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers its streaming service through the KENS 5 app, enabling users to watch on their phones.

articles.title: Samsung dishes out free Galaxy Watch 7 and Galaxy Buds3 Pro for these shoppers
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Mobiles.co.uk is offering a deal where customers who purchase a Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, or S25 Ultra receive a free Samsung Galaxy Watch 7, Galaxy Buds3 Pro, and Galaxy Tab A9+. Customers need to order the phone by June 26 and claim the tablet at the Samsung site by July 26.

articles.title: 27 Beauty Products From Amazon's 'Most Wished For' Section You'll Be Glad You Finally Bought
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro introduced Hair And Body Fragrance Mist, which replicates the scent of their Bum Bum Cream. Phlur launched Vanilla Skin body mist for skin and hair. Hawaiian Tropic introduced SPF 30 mineral powder sunscreen, and Summer Fridays launched "Pink Sugar" tinted lip butter balm. EOS launched Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion while Shark introduced FlexStyle Air Styling hair tool and Tree Hut launched Vanilla Shea Sugar Scrub. Anua launched pore-clearing cleansing oil, and Clean Skin Club launched Clean Towels. Tirtir introduced cushion foundation, while Laura Geller introduced Balance-n-Brighten Color Correcting Foundation. Medicube launched Collagen Night Wrapping Mask and Jelly Cream, and Hawaiian Tropic released After Sun Body Butter. Grace & Stella introduced under eye masks and Wonderskin launched Lip Stain. Nature Republic launched Honey Melting lip tint and Naturium launched The Glow Getter Multi-Oil Body Wash. Laneige launched lip sleeping mask and ColourPop launched "Going Coconuts" nude eyeshadow palette. Saltair launched Body Oil and OPI launched RapiDry Quick Dry nail polish. Glamnetic launched press-on nails and Biodance introduced Bio-Collagen Real Deep masks. Medicube launched dual-textured toner pads.

articles.title: Kai Trump Mimics Donald: Fast Food Drive-Through Prank
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: The 'stunt shift' strategy involves public figures engaging with brands, like Kai Trump at Dunkin' Donuts and Donald Trump at McDonald's, to humanize the brand and tap into nostalgia. Brands are using this strategy to offer authentic experiences and build trust, moving away from traditional polished marketing campaigns. This approach suggests an evolution in influencer marketing, where public figures are taking on roles within companies to promote and endorse a product or service.

articles.title: I tried this kitchen gadget and saved so much time meal prepping
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Salter introduced the VertiCook view air fryer, a 9L capacity appliance with two separate drawers and 12 pre-set cooking functions. The product, available at Asda for Â£99, is praised for its quick cooking times and energy efficiency. Reviewer highlights its usefulness as a 'second pair of hands' in the kitchen, especially for cooking multiple items simultaneously.

articles.title: 37 Hidden Gems On Amazon You've Been Missing Out On
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article highlights various new products including Lip Smacker Rolly Lip Gloss with fruity flavors, Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder for matte skin, and a 2-in-1 nausea relief inhaler with essential oils. Moroccanoil's Mini Must-Haves Sampler is also mentioned, offering travel-sized versions of the company's products.

articles.title: Hot Summer Finds: NADC Burger, Brow Gel and More Must-Haves
articles.author: Crista Lacqua
articles.summary: Grande Cosmetics has released a new brow gel designed for a no-makeup look. Additionally, NADC Burger has opened a new restaurant in SoHo, New York City, offering burgers and fries.

articles.title: What We're Into Now: New Burger Joint, Summer-Approved Brow Product, More
articles.author: Crista Lacqua
articles.summary: Grande Cosmetics launched a new brow gel designed for a no-makeup look. NADC Burger, a new burger restaurant, opened in SoHo, New York City.

articles.title: Myntra launches quick commerce service in Delhi-NCR, Mumbai: How it is different from Blinkit, Zepto and others
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Myntra has expanded its "M-Now" 30-minute delivery service to Delhi-NCR and Mumbai after a successful pilot in Bengaluru. The service focuses on delivering clothes, including from premium brands like Vero Moda, Mango, Calvin Klein, and Tommy Hilfiger and luxury beauty brands such as Dyson, YSL, and Prada.

articles.title: Trump Just Expanded His Tawdry Empire of Scams
articles.summary: Trump Mobile has launched a new mobile device, the 'T1 Phone 8002', available for $499 with $100 preorders.  Additionally, Trump Mobile is offering a wireless service for $47.45 a month. Mark Cuban suggests the phone might integrate a crypto wallet leveraging WLF, $Trump, and related stable coins.

articles.title: I tested Perplexity vs Google AI overview with 7 prompts â€” the results were shocking
articles.author: Nigel Powell
articles.summary: Google has released a new search function called "AI Overviews" to compete with AI-powered search services like Perplexity AI. The article compares Google's AI Overviews with Perplexity AI across different search prompts, highlighting the strengths and weaknesses of each platform in delivering informed search results. Perplexity delivers more engaging and in-depth results compared to Google's standard search results in some cases.

articles.title: Google Unveils â€˜Search Live' with Voice Chat for AI Mode Users
articles.author: Monitor News Desk
articles.summary: Google has launched Search Live, a new real-time voice conversation feature within the Google app on Android and iOS. This feature, powered by Google's Gemini AI model, allows for natural spoken interactions with Google Search and displays helpful web links. Currently available in the U.S. for users enrolled in the AI Mode experiment through Google Labs, Google plans to enhance Search Live with camera input support.

articles.title: Draw the Line Right: 4 Must-Have Eyeliners That Define Every Look
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra is showcasing new eyeliner products from Lakme, Blue Heaven, FACES CANADA, and SUGAR, highlighting features like waterproof and smudge-proof formulas, ease of application, and intense pigmentation. Each eyeliner offers unique benefits, catering to different user preferences and makeup styles, all available for purchase on Myntra.

articles.title: 35 Indulgent But Cheap Beauty Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new beauty and skincare products. Eos introduced the Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, while L'Oreal Paris launched the Bond Repair Oil-in-Serum for hair. Additionally, E.l.f. released the Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm, offering a budget-friendly alternative to high-end lip balms.

articles.title: ðŸ§¼ Amazon's top cleaners and deep-cleaning tools are on sale ahead of Prime Day 2025
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Amazon is having a Prime Day sale from July 8-11, 2025, where various products will be offered at discounted prices. These products include cleaning products like The Pink Stuff and handheld steam cleaners. Anyone can take advantage of the Amazon Spring deals.

articles.title: Here's What Parents Should Actually Buy For Summer
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: KitchenAid introduced a shaved ice attachment for its mixers. BabyBjorn launched a travel crib designed to fit in a carry-on bag. Veer offers a Cruiser City wagon designed for easy transport of essentials on summer outings.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer's 'cute' Â£15 cotton nightdress that's 'cool and comfortable'
articles.author: Jayne Thomson
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is selling a pure cotton printed nightdress, part of the M&S Collection, online for Â£15. The nightdress is described as breathable, comfortable, and suitable for warm weather. Customer reviews highlight its comfort, quality, and design, although some mention issues with shrinking or sleeve length.

articles.title: If Your Messy Home Makes You Uncomfortable, These 32 Products Are Screaming Your Name
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Scrubbing Bubbles introduced a toilet cleaning stamp that releases cleaning gel to clean toilets without a brush. Bissell offers the Little Green machine, a portable upholstery and carpet cleaner for pet accidents. Bissell also provides a carpet and floor sweeper for quick and quiet cleaning.

articles.title: Take the Best Selfie Yet with Lava's Innovative Smartphones
articles.author: Mansi Praharaj
articles.summary: Lava has introduced a lineup of smartphones including the Agni 3 with a rear AMOLED display for high-resolution selfies, the Shark 5G as an accessible entry-level option, the Storm Lite 5G featuring a 50MP Sony IMX752 rear camera, and the Bold N1 Pro 5G offering a premium look with an 8MP front camera and screen flash. These smartphones cater to different user needs, with a focus on selfie capabilities and overall camera performance.

articles.title: Google launches â€˜Search Live' with voice input for AI Mode users
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Google launched 'Search Live,' a new voice-based feature for Android and iOS apps, enabling real-time, back-and-forth conversations with Google Search. Powered by a custom version of Google's Gemini model, Search Live is initially available in the U.S. for AI Mode Labs users. Google plans to expand Search Live capabilities in AI Mode, including the ability to use your phone's camera.

articles.title: 36 Things You Might Appreciate If You Are Downright Sick And Tired Of Being A Responsible Adult
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article introduces a diverse range of new products, including the Windex outdoor glass cleaner for windows, Pikk-it tool for removing hair from vacuum cleaners, and a scrunchie/towel hybrid for faster hair drying. Additionally, it features products like SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes for reducing sweat and a self-closing toothpaste cap to prevent messes, offering innovative solutions for various everyday problems.

articles.title: 28 Genuinely Cool TikTok-Approved Things You Won't Forget About 5 Seconds After You Scroll By
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: NeeDoh launched a "Dream Drop" fidget toy. Nuts 'N More introduced Chocolate Maple Pretzel Peanut Butter Spread. Lumify Eye Drops became a top-selling product on Amazon. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Essence released "What the Fake!" Plumping Lip Filler.

articles.title: 32 Products That'll Do The Things You Hate Doing For You
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Dawn introduces Platinum Powerwash Dish Spray for effectively cleaning caked-on food and grease. Dyson launches the WashG1 wet cleaner, an innovation for cleaning hard floors with water. Baby Brezza provides a Formula Pro Advanced and Bottle Washer Pro for baby feeding convenience.

articles.title: Why settle? Get all-day power, tough build, and smart performance with the HUAWEI nova Y73, now available for only P9,999
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: HUAWEI has launched the nova Y73 smartphone in the Philippines, priced at P9,999. The phone boasts a 6,620mAh battery, 40W SuperCharge Turbo, aerospace-grade durability, and a 50MP AI camera system. The HUAWEI nova Y73 is available on Shopee, Lazada, TikTok, and HUAWEI Experience Stores with a free HUAWEI Band offer while supplies last.

articles.title: There's no such thing as 'dull talent' Use AI to unlock your true potential
articles.author: Anniversary Issue-I
articles.summary: The article highlights the capabilities of various AI tools in enhancing different skills. ChatGPT assists with writing, PhotoMath and Khan Academy's AI tools aid in mathematics, Midjourney, DALLÂ·E, and Canva facilitate design, and Duolingo helps with language learning. Additionally, AIVA and Soundraw assist with music composition, while Lumen5 supports video editing, enabling users to develop and express themselves creatively.

articles.title: Trump Just Expanded His Tawdry Empire of Scams
articles.author: Jason Linkins
articles.summary: Trump Mobile, a new wireless service, and the 'T1 Phone 8002,' a gold-looking mobile device, are being launched.  The phone allegedly costs $499 with $100 preorders, while the wireless service costs $47.45 a month. Concerns arise regarding the phone's origin and whether it is made in America as claimed.

articles.title: 'Super flattering' New Look midi dress is 'wonderful for summer'
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: New Look is promoting their Puffed Sleeve Midi Dress, priced at Â£35.99 and available in multiple colors and sizes. The dress features a square neckline and puff sleeves. As an alternative, the Strappy Tie Front Midi Dress is being sold for Â£40 by Next.

articles.title: 'Super flattering' New Look striped midi dress is 'wonderful for summer'
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: New Look is offering the 'Puffed Sleeve Midi Dress' for Â£35.99 in three colors and sizes 6-20, featuring a square neckline and puff sleeves. Alternatively, Next is selling the 'Strappy Tie Front Midi Dress' for Â£40.

articles.title: vivo Y29 rolls out with tough build, 6500mAh battery
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Smartphone brand vivo has introduced the Y29, a new mobile device designed for active lifestyles in the Philippines. The Y29 features protective elements like Cushioning Structure, impact-resistant clear case with reinforced corners, and Shield Glass by SCHOTT. It also offers IP64 dust and splash resistance.

articles.title: Picjam: AI fashion photography tool
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Picjam introduces an AI-powered tool designed to revolutionize fashion photography for businesses by enhancing visual content creation. The tool's features include a Fashion Generator for creating videos, a Swap Model feature for model replacement with AI-generated diversity, and Lifestyle Backgrounds for placing products in diverse environments.

articles.title: 29 Cooling Essentials For Surviving Hot Weather
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of products designed to help consumers stay cool during the summer. These include the Naturium cooling gel body wash, a personal umbrella, a 360-degree portable fan, SweatBlock wipes, Magic Gel back relief pack, cooling blankets and sheets, a polar bear hydrating eye stick, and Frostbuddy drink cooler, all targeted to alleviate heat-related discomfort.

articles.title: Missing the harvest: Australia sleeps while the world is cashing in on our native plants
articles.author: Tara Croker
articles.summary: Yaala Sparkling, a new generation beverage company, was born to share authentic Indigenous flavours globally and currently stocks its drinks across Australia. The company aims to expand the path for other Indigenous producers, protecting cultural knowledge, strengthening IP rights, and exporting a uniquely Australian story.

articles.title: Opinion: Tasting the trends!
articles.author: Mirha Asif
articles.summary: An ice cream parlour introduced Paan Kulfi, a new treat with a twist of paan and creamy kulfi. The Paan Kulfi has green color, ice cream soda-ish flavour, and is topped with sugar-coated colourful fennel seeds, crushed coconut, and all those classic paan ingredients. Customers are craving for something new and unique food experience.

articles.title: Xiaomi Vacuum Deal: Get It Cheaper Now!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Xiaomi is offering the Vacuum Cleaner G20, which includes features like 60 minutes of autonomy and multiple accessories, at an accessible price point. The G20 boasts 150 AW suction power and includes an electric brush bar with LED lighting and accessories, making it a versatile cleaning tool. Promotions are available such as 30-euro savings on the Xiaomi G20.

articles.title: EU launches radical smartphone labels to expose flaws and features â€” here's what you need to know
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Starting June 20, 2025, new smartphones and tablets sold in the EU must include an energy efficiency label, providing information about durability, battery life, and repairability.  This label rates energy efficiency from A to G and includes details on battery endurance, drop test durability, battery life cycle, repairability, ingress protection, and product registration. Every new smartphone and tablet must meet mandatory eco-design standards, including durability, battery longevity, repairability, software support, and repair access.

articles.title: Tesla's First India Showroom To Open In Mumbai This July: Report
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Tesla's Model Y is anticipated to be the initial model introduced in India. The Model Y has been observed undergoing testing in various instances in India.

articles.title: You Can Now Buy a Sample of Ozzy Osbourne's DNA in Twelve Easy Payments
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: Liquid Death, in partnership with Ozzy Osbourne, launched a limited run of iced tea cans infused with DNA from Ozzy Osbourne. The iced tea is no longer available for purchase.

articles.title: Jio x BGMI: Telecom operator launches new Rs 495 and Rs 545 plans with free BGMI rewards
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Jio introduced new prepaid plans priced at Rs 495 and Rs 545. These plans represent new service offerings from the company.
